thread.section_title: The Iroquois New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Stay
thread.title_full: Fantastic Stay - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Q8157KDjohnb
title: Fantastic Stay
text: Fantastic staff, especially front desk personnel. Complimentary oranges at front desk, coffee and hot apple cider in lobby. Room was extremely clean and well maintained. DVR and free DVDs for watching. Complimentary chocolates in room. Workout and SAUNA on 3rd floor was GREAT. Small bar/restaurant in hotel was nice and cozy, however a more diversified menu would be appreciated. Definitely going to return for another stay.
